products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: D | SOLVENT PLANT > D1 | HYDRANT SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint. Pipe joints shall of grooved with groove couplings. All escavations, pedestal supports, structural supports shall be of vendors scope. 100 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ms(black steel), grade: heavy, thickness: 5.4mm, standard: indian standard 1239 part -1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, reduces clamps, ms support dash fasteners, painting: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, pipe joints: grooved with groove couplings, scope: all excavations, pedestal supports, structural supports by vendor

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: D | SOLVENT PLANT > D1 | HYDRANT SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply & installation of SS oblique type single headed Landing valve with 80 mm inlet and 63 mm outlet SS instantaneous male coupling with rubber cap and chain conforming to IS : 5290 including matching flanges, gasket, nuts and bolts complete.

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply,Installation of Butterfly valve as per BS :5155 (Wafer type) matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts.. Necessary fittings shall be provided by erection vendor. Size 80 mm NB

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply & installation of MS Hose Box of fabricated from 16 SWG CRCA sheet double door with lockable arrangements to accommodate 2 RRL hose of 15 m length and one branch pipe painted white inside and red outside with one key. (750X600X250 mm)
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ms(mild steel), fabrication: 16 swg crca sheet, doors: double, lockable: yes, capacity: 2 rrl hose of 15 m length and one branch pipe, paint: white inside and red outside, accessories: one key

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply & installation of swinging type hose reel drum fabricated from 14 SWG CRCA sheets painted with red colour stove paint 2 coats over 1 coat of primer with 30 m long 20 mm dia rubber hose pipe with with SS self closing shut – off nozzle of 5 mm outlet fixed on wall.
products_entries.size: hose length: 30 m, hose diameter: 20 mm, nozzle outlet: 5 mm
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: swinging, fabrication: 14 swg crca sheets, paint: red colour stove paint 2 coats over 1 coat of primer, hose: rubber, nozzle: ss(stainless steel) self closing shut-off, installation: fixed on wall

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply,installation,testing and commissioning of Foam Sprinkler nozzle with necessary threaded fittings as per drawing. The sprinkler shall be Open Aspiration, Pendent type, K-42 with standard spray angle.End connection 1/2" NPT/BSP.UL/FM Approved. Spray nozzle K factor -42

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: D | SOLVENT PLANT > D2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of Foam bladder tank vertical type ,manufacturing as per ASME, section-VIII part- I. The bladder material shall be BUNA-N. The Bladder Tank shall be supplied along with all necessary valves, Hydraulically Operated Foam Concentrae Control Valve ,fittingss & instruments as per Technical data sheet attached with Tender documents.
Capacity of 1700 ltr.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: vertical, manufacturing standard: ASME section-VIII part-I, bladder material: BUNA-N, included: all necessary valves, hydraulically operated foam concentrate control valve, fittings & instruments as per technical data sheet

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: D | SOLVENT PLANT > D2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply of AR-AFFF(3%) foam concentrate(PFOS/PFAS free) having sp. Gravity 1.0±.02 g/mlat 20⁰C  , PH 7.0-8.5 & viscosity 1200 ±300 cps.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: concentration: 3%, PFOS/PFAS free: yes, specific gravity: 1.0±.02 g/ml at 20⁰C, pH: 7.0-8.5, viscosity: 1200 ±300 cps

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: D | SOLVENT PLANT > D2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee, reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications
150 NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: class: C (heavy class), standard: indian standard 1239, fittings: threaded or grooved, included: elbows, tees, reducers, welding flanges, clamps, MS brackets/hangers, steel supports, primer: zinc chromate, paint: 2 coats red enamel, as per fire authorities requirement, for above ground pipes

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: D | SOLVENT PLANT > D2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of  Air Buffer tank complete with necessary components. The compressor shall be of capacity 15 M³/Hr( FAD), discharge pressure 10 bar, single stage, reciprocating type.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: discharge pressure: 10 bar, compressor type: single stage, reciprocating, included: necessary components

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: D | SOLVENT PLANT > D3 | WATER CURTAIN
products_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, erection and testing of  heavy grade(class-C) pipes  conforming to IS-1239 including all fittings viz. tees, elbows, reducers, union,  flanges, rubber gaskets,  GI  nuts  bolts,  washer and structural steels for pipe supports. Hanger support with anchor fasteners and clamps shall be supplied to fix the pipes on ceiling wall etc. including supporting/fixing the pipe on floor / wall /ceiling with clamps,   hangers (using anchor fastners) as per specification. Cutting of floors, walls etc and making it good after erection of pipes shall be of vendor's scope. Necessary painting with 2 coats of primer and 2 coats of synthetic enamel paints to be done and supply of paints shall be with vendor's scope.
50 NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: heavy (class-C), standard: indian standard 1239, included: tees, elbows, reducers, union, flanges, rubber gaskets, GI nuts, bolts, washer, structural steels for pipe supports, hanger support with anchor fasteners and clamps, supporting/fixing on floor/wall/ceiling with clamps, hangers (using anchor fasteners), painting: 2 coats primer, 2 coats synthetic enamel, supply of paints by vendor, scope: cutting/making good floors/walls by vendor

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be with grooved couplings. Necesary supports of all kind shall be of vendor's scope. 80 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: heavy, thickness: 5.4mm, standard: IS(indian standard) 1239 Part -1, supplied with: elbows, tees, flanges, reduces clamps, ms support dash fasteners, painting: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, joints: grooved couplings, supports: all kind, vendor's scope

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: D | SOLVENT PLANT > D5 | FDA SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of aspiration detector with CMOS imager combined with multiple photodiode for reliable very early warning in a wide range of environments with minimal nuisance alarms. The detector should have 4 pipe inlet and min 100m pipelength support per inlet.The detector should have Smart on-board filter retains dust count and remaining filter life for predictable maintenance& coverage area of min 5000 Sq.

products_entries.feature_or_specifications: imager: CMOS, sensor: multiple photodiode, feature: very early warning, feature: minimal nuisance alarms, feature: smart on-board filter retains dust count and remaining filter life for predictable maintenance
